promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive simple gecko steel-type pokemon holding a ornate lance. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or gecko. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Lancereptilium, a a massive simple gecko steel-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: Armor Press, Tail Shake. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "gecko", "steel" or "Lancereptilium". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, gecko-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, grey ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This colossal armor-scaled creature thrives in craggy terrains, harnessing its Tail Shake and Armor Press faculties to fend off foes.
